events.title: Cinematics Animations
events.description: All the codes pertaining the the cinematics of the game.

events.title: In-game Animations
events.description: All the codes pertaining the the gameplay of Ninja and the Masks.

children.title: Player Animator
children.description: All the codes handling the animations of the Player.

children.text: Walk cycle taking into account the Tallgrass or water.
If the Player lands on a PlayerObstacle object, triggers a small hop (see function).
Otherwise, disable the Jumping instance boolean and reestablish the PlayerObjects' solidity.
This part changes the animation if the Player is in a Tallgrass or water patch.
When the Player begins to Fall in his jump (so midway), trigger a new Enemy Turn.
Tallgrass or water Fix! Ensures that the right animation is playing even in transition from Tallgrass or water or into Tallgrass or water.

children.title: NPCs Animator
children.description: All the codes handling the animations of the NPCs.

children.title: Door Opening Animation
children.description: All the codes for the door animation.

children.title: Music Note VFX System
children.description: All the codes that makes the SoundSource objects spawn music notes.

children.text: This system uses a random number to choose the note frame. The note itself is a bullet with a sine behaviour.
very second, each note is given a new movement angle.

children.title: Insects
children.description: All the codes that regulates the spawn and movement of butterflies and bees.

children.text: Initial Insects. Insects only appear on the MainWorld for now.

actions.text: Picks a BeeFlowerSpot and moves towards it.

children.title: Bees Movement
children.description: All the codes that makes the bees target the random BeeFlowerSpots.

children.text: Stops bees when they hit a BeeFlowerSpot.

children.title: Butterflies Movement
children.description: All the codes that makes the butterflies move.

children.text: Just sets the butterfly to change its angle every second.

children.title: Generic Mirror
children.description: All the code that makes the insects mirror based on their angle of motion. (Took me a while to figure these out ._.")

children.title: Gusts
children.description: All the codes that makes the windgusts in the Desert.

children.title: Hayballs
children.description: All the codes that spawns the Hayballs in the Desert Oasis.

children.title: Big Tree Leaves
children.description: All the codes to set the particles spawned by the VFXLeafSpawner to the right frame.

children.title: PowerPlant Smoke
children.description: All the codes for the PowerPlant smoke.
